answerText: An Equal Music[10] An Equal Music is by this Indian author of Golden Gate, who wrote about Rupa Mehra's search for a husband for her daughter in A Suitable Boy.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Editors 1 | 13 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel nurses a long-held passion for the pianist Julia McNicholl. For 10 points each. 13. The protagonist of this novel nurses a long-held passion for the pianist Julia McNicholl. For 10 points each.  [10] Name this novel in which Michael Holme is a violinist in the Maggiore Quartet.
